div.p:
71 Main Street, P.O. Box 48
Wardsboro, VT 05355

Town clerk/treasurer or Selectboard, please call (802) 896-6055
Hours: Monday-Thursday & 1st Friday of each month – 8am -5pm (closed 12pm – 1pm)
Vermont State Police – (802) 722-4600 or Emergency – dial 911

Transfer Station – (802) 896-6553
Hours – Monday, Saturday, Sunday – 9am – 5pm
Tuesday, Friday – 12pm – 5pm
Before burning outdoors, please call (802) 380-1181 – Fire Warden Austin Meeks
